reviewText: I love all three of these movies. They are ridiculous and amazing!
Fun flick. I like the other Kung Fu Mahjong movies too.
The first "Kung Fu Mahjong" was funny and silly. After the first on, the gags became risqu, and just gross. This series could have been a great cult classic if not for the vulgarity.
This is a fun  and very funny movie, if you like Majhong and if you know chinese it is helpful biut if you don't there are subtitles and just watching the move can make you laugh

While not as funny as the second installment of the Kung Fu Mahjong franchise, Vol. 3 delivers enough laughs, silly humor, slapstick and Mahjong action to keep this Mahjong enthusiast happy. It's not suppose to be serious....just entertaining, and...it's cheap. Cheers
